Uses of Class
com.codename1.codescan.CodeScanner

Packages that use CodeScanner
com.codename1.codescan Bar/QR code scanning API, currently based on the zxing implementation 
com.codename1.impl The implementation package should not be used by developers, it is an internal implementation detail which will break compatibility between major Codename One releases. 
com.codename1.ui Main widget package containing the component/container "composite" similar both in terminology and design to Swing/AWT. 
 

Uses of CodeScanner in com.codename1.codescan
 

Methods in com.codename1.codescan that return CodeScanner
static CodeScanner CodeScanner.getInstance()
          Returns the instance of the code scanner, notice that this method is equivalent to Display.getInstance().getCodeScanner().
 

Uses of CodeScanner in com.codename1.impl
 

Methods in com.codename1.impl that return CodeScanner
 CodeScanner CodenameOneImplementation.getCodeScanner()
          Returns the native implementation of the code scanner or null
 

Uses of CodeScanner in com.codename1.ui
 

Methods in com.codename1.ui that return CodeScanner
 CodeScanner Display.getCodeScanner()
          Returns the native implementation of the code scanner or null
